definitions.definition: One who reforms , or who works for reform.
One who was involved in the Reformation .
A device which converts hydrocarbons into a hydrogen-rich mixture of gases.
A device used to convert petroleum refinery naphthas , typically having low octane ratings, into high-octane liquid products called reformates .

main_definition: One who reforms , or who works for reform.
secondary_definitions: ( historical , Christianity ) One who was involved in the Reformation .
( chemical engineering , fuel cells ) A device which converts hydrocarbons into a hydrogen-rich mixture of gases.
( petrochemistry ) A device used to convert petroleum refinery naphthas , typically having low octane ratings, into high-octane liquid products called reformates .
